sen.j: 天下普請（てんかぶしん）とは、江戸幕府が全国の諸大名に命令し、行わせた土木工事のこと。
sen.e: Tenka bushin were a type of public works project in which the Edo bakufu (shogunate) ordered all the various daimyo to contribute.
Tenka bushin was a type of public works projects which the Edo bakufu (shogunate) ordered daimyo throughout Japan to perform.
Tenka bushin was a type of public works projects which the Edo bakufu (shogunate) ordered daimyo throughout Japan to perform.

sen.j: なかでも城郭普請が有名であるが、河川工事などインフラ整備などの工事も含んでいる。
sen.e: Among the various types of tenka bushin, jokaku (castle or fortress) construction projects are the most famous, but the term tenka bushin various other types of public works projects, including river-related construction projects and other infrastructure improvements.

Among the various types of tenka bushin, jokaku (castle or fortress) construction projects are the most famous, but the term tenka bushin includes various other types of public works projects, such as river-related construction projects and other infrastructure improvements.
